name: Roulette Simulator (itch)
description:
This is a simulator I created for Roulette to safely 'gamble' fake money in an attempt to test strategies and view probabilities.  This simulator can run thousands of spins at once or a single round of roulette.  

Think it's always safe to bet on Black?  Find out.

Is 17 really Lucky to you?  Test your theory.

What if I bet on Black after the ball lands on Red several times?  We can test this too.
